verses.verse: ( Extol Him, All You Peoples) הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> hal·lū Praise אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all you גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> gō·w·yim nations! שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ <WH7623> bə·ḥū·hū Extol Him, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all you הָאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH523> hā·’um·mîm peoples! ( Cited in )

כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî For גָ֘בַ֤ר <WH1396> ḡā·ḇar great is עָלֵ֨ינוּ׀ <WH5921> ‘ā·lê·nū toward us, חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> ḥas·dōw His loving devotion וֶֽאֱמֶת־ <WH571> we·’ĕ·meṯ- and the faithfulness יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām endures forever. הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal·lū- Hallelujah יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> yāh ...! ( Or Hallelu YAH, meaning Praise the LORD)
